EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for attending Gartner Catalyst 2018 last week
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for joining Pivotal at Gartner Catalyst 2018 <[[https://www.gartner.com/en/conferences/na/catalyst-us]]>. We hope you came away inspired by the many industry analysts and organizations sharing their wisdom and experience about successful digital business transformation.
With Pivotal you can deeply explore enterprise software trends like microservices architectures, continuous delivery, and platform operations. Check out these resources <[[https://content.pivotal.io/gartner-catalyst-2018?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-gartner-catalyst-summit-q318]]> for further insight into accelerating your digital transformation journey through both culture and technology.
Want to hear even more from companies like T-Mobile and others who have found success in these areas? Join your peers at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-gartner-catalyst-summit-q318]]> to pick up new skills and ideas for building better software, faster. Register here <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register/registration/select?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-gartner-catalyst-summit-q318]]> with the discount code Attendee_Event_100 to get $100 off the posted price. We hope to see you again soon! Thank you, The Pivotal Team
